name: Float (itch) (fifisaac)
description:
My submission for Godot Wild Jam #44, and my first game jam entry. Hope you enjoy! I might have made the last few levels a bit too difficult but it's a bit late to change them now.

How to Play:

- The bubble will automatically float upwards

- If it hits something, it will pop

- Use A/D, arrow keys, left stick or

D-pad to move left and right

- If you are going to hit something or need to get through a tight gap, you can split the bubble in half, but only once per level

- Do this by pressing Space, LMB or A (for XBOX controllers, or
equivalent for other controllers)

Music:
